feed.title: MARINKA ZITNIK
feed.subtitle: Machine Learning for Medicine and Science

entry.title: Workshop on Graph Learning Benchmarks
entry.content: Submit your papers to our Workshop on Graph Learning Benchmarks organized at The Web Conference (WWW). Call for papers!
entry.summary: Submit your papers to our Workshop on Graph Learning Benchmarks organized at The Web Conference (WWW). Call for papers!

entry.title: NASA: Precision Space Health System
entry.content: Human space exploration beyond low Earth orbit will involve missions of significant distance and duration. To effectively mitigate myriad space health hazards, paradigm shifts in data and space health systems are necessary to enable Earth independence. Delighted to be working with NASA and can share our recommendations!
entry.summary: Human space exploration beyond low Earth orbit will involve missions of significant distance and duration. To effectively mitigate myriad space health hazards, paradigm shifts in data and space health systems are necessary to enable Earth independence. Delighted to be working with NASA and can share our recommendations!

entry.title: Beyond Low Earth Orbit: Biological Research & AI

link.title: Beyond Low Earth Orbit: Biological Research & AI

entry.content: As space exploration is extended beyond low Earth orbit, experiments must be maximally autonomous and intelligent to guide biological research. Excited to be working with NASA and can share our recommendations!
entry.summary: As space exploration is extended beyond low Earth orbit, experiments must be maximally autonomous and intelligent to guide biological research. Excited to be working with NASA and can share our recommendations!

entry.title: Attend Our AI4Science Workshop at NeurIPS 2021

link.title: Attend Our AI4Science Workshop at NeurIPS 2021

entry.content: Join us at NeurIPS 2021 for the AI for Science Workshop on Monday, Dec 13, 8am-6pm ET. This will be a great day to celebrate AI achievements in scientific discovery and highlight open challenges that need to be addressed to move the field forward.
entry.summary: Join us at NeurIPS 2021 for the AI for Science Workshop on Monday, Dec 13, 8am-6pm ET. This will be a great day to celebrate AI achievements in scientific discovery and highlight open challenges that need to be addressed to move the field forward.

entry.title: Submit to Our AAAI 2022 Workshop
entry.content: Submit your finest work at the nexus between trustworthy AI and healthcare to AAAI 2022. Call for papers.
entry.summary: Submit your finest work at the nexus between trustworthy AI and healthcare to AAAI 2022. Call for papers.

entry.title: Co-Evolution for Functional Interactions
entry.content: Hot off the press in Nature Communications. Excited to share an ML approach for predicting functional interactions between human genes using the phylogenetic profiles across 1,154 eukaryotic species.
entry.summary: Hot off the press in Nature Communications. Excited to share an ML approach for predicting functional interactions between human genes using the phylogenetic profiles across 1,154 eukaryotic species.

entry.title: Adverse Drug Effects During the Pandemic

link.title: Adverse Drug Effects During the Pandemic

entry.content: The COVID-19 pandemic has reshaped health and medicine in ways both dramatic and subtle. Some of the less obvious shifts can only emerge from analysis of millions of pieces of data—patient records, medical notes, clinical encounter reports. Read the story in Harvard Medicine News highlighting our research.
entry.summary: The COVID-19 pandemic has reshaped health and medicine in ways both dramatic and subtle. Some of the less obvious shifts can only emerge from analysis of millions of pieces of data—patient records, medical notes, clinical encounter reports. Read the story in Harvard Medicine News highlighting our research.

entry.title: Graph-Guided Networks for Time Series
entry.content: New preprint! We introduce Raindrop, a graph-guided network for learning representations of irregularly sampled multivariate time series.
entry.summary: New preprint! We introduce Raindrop, a graph-guided network for learning representations of irregularly sampled multivariate time series.

entry.title: Massive Analysis of Differential Adverse Events

link.title: Massive Analysis of Differential Adverse Events

entry.content: Hot off the press in Nature Computational Science! We develop an algorithmic approach for massive analysis of drug adverse events. Our analyses of 10,443,476 adverse event reports have implications for safe medication use and public health policy, and can enable comparison of COVID-19 pandemic to other health emergencies.
entry.summary: Hot off the press in Nature Computational Science! We develop an algorithmic approach for massive analysis of drug adverse events. Our analyses of 10,443,476 adverse event reports have implications for safe medication use and public health policy, and can enable comparison of COVID-19 pandemic to other health emergencies.

entry.title: Leveraging Cell Ontology to Classify Cell Types

link.title: Leveraging Cell Ontology to Classify Cell Types

entry.content: Hot off the press in Nature Communications! We developed OnClass, an algorithm and accompanying software for automatically classifying cells into cell types that are part of the controlled vocabulary that forms the Cell Ontology.
entry.summary: Hot off the press in Nature Communications! We developed OnClass, an algorithm and accompanying software for automatically classifying cells into cell types that are part of the controlled vocabulary that forms the Cell Ontology.
